html_description:
On the waypoint editor, add the following flow: Dot menu icon -> menu pop up -> delete confirmation Please refer to this comment for screenshots of the final design that should be achieved. The following video demonstrates the current situation. You don't have a way to delete a waypoint (you can save a waypoint while the text input is empty to delete that waypoint, but it's not clear for the user that they can do so). https://github.com/Expensify/App/assets/98560306/9884c800-6bdd-4226-91e6-d613e97148fa
